EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.Intelligent.Services.N.G.N.18224.TBC (Nurture 3).Email 2B
EmailTemplate.subject: 3 reasons to upgrade to ultra-broadband with Nokia
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> One less ultra-broadband headache For home activation, save time, money, and perhaps your sanity
Building a new network is not an easy task. Especially when it comes to connecting and activating new homes. Beyond time-consuming civil works, there are the complexities of integrating passive and active plant, coordinating multiple contractors and keeping your customers onside.
Nokia Network Build Control Management is here to help. Combining automation, analytics and our extensive experience, we can help you deploy your network and activate services faster and cheaper than ever. So you save time, money, and perhaps your sanity.
Read our white paper to learn more. Connect with us Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
